summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Smart Resume Builder MVP. Backend APIs working excellently with 93.3% success rate. Frontend landing page and OAuth flow working perfectly. Critical authentication issue found with frontend cookie handling preventing dashboard access.

critical_bugs.issue: PDF generation fails with 500/520 error due to missing WeasyPrint system dependencies (libpangoft2-1.0-0)

minor_issues.issue: Create CV returns 200 instead of 201 status code
minor_issues.impact: Minor - functionality works but HTTP status not standard

critical_bugs.issue: Frontend cookie-based authentication not working - users redirected to landing page instead of dashboard
critical_bugs.impact: Users cannot access dashboard or any authenticated pages via frontend
critical_bugs.details: API authentication works with Bearer tokens, but frontend cookie handling fails. Session cookies not being properly validated.

integration_issues.issue: Cookie-based session validation failing between frontend and backend

passed_tests: Backend authentication API (/api/auth/me) with Bearer tokens
CV CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete)
AI CV analysis with scoring and suggestions
AI job optimization with keyword matching
Frontend landing page loading and navigation
Frontend responsive design and UI elements

success_percentage.frontend: 70% (landing page and OAuth working, dashboard auth failing)

critical_fixes: Fix frontend cookie-based authentication - users cannot access dashboard
Install WeasyPrint system dependencies for PDF generation
investigation_needed: Check cookie domain/path settings in backend auth endpoints
Verify frontend cookie handling in ProtectedRoute component
Test session validation between frontend and backend
minor_fixes: Update CV creation endpoint to return 201 status code instead of 200
